name: Blobby (itch) (void Games(play);)
description:
IMPORTANT: For some reason you have to click on the title screen before you press space for it to do anything

This is my second published game I made in godot, and my first 3d godot game ever! Its short, but I hope you enjoy it! (there is a secret ending)

The music is a bit glitched and all the sound effects are delayed, I'm not sure why.

I made the music and sound effects in Bosca Ceoil, and the models and animations in blender.
